name: music_shop_auth
description: The Music Shop handlebars assignment with authentication added.

scripts.test: npm run mysql && mocha test/tests.js $FLAG --exit; npm run mysql:stop
scripts.mysql: npm run mysql:restart && npm run mysql:check
scripts.mysql:restart: npm run mysql:stop; npm run mysql:start
scripts.mysql:start:shell: npm run mysql:restart && npm run mysql:check && npm run mysql:shell
scripts.mysql:check: until docker exec -it mysql-sandbox mysql -e "use $npm_package_config_DB_NAME; show tables;"; do echo ...; sleep 1; done && sleep 3
